ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR (
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__pc, "Home Phone"), AND(ISBLANK(PersonHomePhone), ISBLANK(Home_Number__c)) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__pc, "Email"), ISBLANK(PersonEmail) ),
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Preferred_Contact_Method__pc, "Business Phone"), ISBLANK(Business_Phone__pc) ) )
